article.title: Welcome to the Nevada U.S. Export Assistance Centers
article.summary: Learn more about the Nevada U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
​

With two offices in Nevada, the U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized Nevada companies develop international markets.

  • Las Vegas
  • Reno

Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • Identify qualified international partners
  • Navigate international regulation and documentation challenges
  • Develop foreign market entry strategies
  • Access valuable foreign market information
  • Other export-related guidance​​​

What's happening in Nevada

  • ​SBA Grants Available for Nevada Exporters!​
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the Nevada U.S. Export Assistance Centers
